reviews.comments: El departamento está muy bien ubicado, es tal como lo muestran las fotografías. Agradable, con muebles y adornos de buen gusto. La cocina muy bien equipada. El balcón y la terraza con jacuzzi son el valor agregado al departamento. Con mucho sol y muy iluminado! Soledad y Fernando muy amables y atentos.

El departamento es muy lindo y limpio, está muy bien cuidado y tiene una gran ubicación. La azotea y el jacuzzi son un gran plus que disfrutamos en nuestra estadía. Soledad es una gran anfitriona, nos recibió con un vino de regalo y siempre estuvo preocupada de que estuviéramos bien.
Departamento precioso. Muy bien ubicado. Tal cual como se ve en las fotos.

El Apartamento de Soledad es muy cómodo, tiene buen tamaño y esta muy bien equipado, la terraza y el jacuzzi en la azotea lo convierten en un joya. El barrio es tranquilo y muy animado a la vez, cerca de restaurantes, tiendas de todo tipo y muy bien conectado al resto de la ciudad. El check in fue fácil y rápido, igual que el check out, y aunque no conocimos a Soledad en persona, estuvo en contacto con nosotros todo el tiempo. En definitiva una excelente experiencia Airbnb.

El recibimiento de Soledad es espectacular! El departamento es mejor de lo que se ve en las fotos. El jacuzzi y terraza son maravillosos para una tarde de relajo. Sin duda lo recomiendo 100% 
La ubicación buenísima 
Excelente elección !!!

El estudio de Soledad nos encanto! Es muy agradable, luminoso y excepcionalmente calmo para Buenos Aires. La terraza es un lugar de paz magnifico en el centro de la ciudad! A su vez, esta muy bien ubicado en el centro de Palermo Soho, cerca de mil restaurantes y lugares para salir pero en una cuadra tranquila con poco transito, y no lejos de los bosques de Palermo y del Rosedal, para quienes quieran ir a pasear o a correr. Sol y su esposo fueron muy atentos en todo, el departamento tiene lo necesario, y con buen gusto. Recomiendo!!

This studio is perfect for anyone wishing to stay in the BEST neighborhood in BA and who cares about style and comfort. The main studio space is what makes this a great place to stay. The upstairs patio is what makes it AMAZING. Highly recommended. Sorry for drinking all your Nescafé pods, Soledad!
Vale muito a pena o lugar, recomendamos a todos!

Great place as advertised. The roof makes it with a private swimming pool by day and a hot tub at night. Much easier to use than expected. Wonderful, relaxing place. I would definitely rent this place again for sure!

What a gem in Palermo! The apartment was clean, central to bars, restaurants and shopping, surprisingly quiet and calm given it's location. We loved the private rooftop garden and jacuzzi, and Soledad provided coffee and a bottle of wine too. So special and thoughtful. We would love to come back to BA and will definitely stay here again when we do!

Great location, very walkable to restaurants,  grocery, subway, parks... Host responds quickly, very clean, lovely outdoor space however the hot water runs out too quick when filling up the spa so it doesn’t stay warm for long. Highly recommended if your looking to stay in the Palermo area.

Sol’s place is in the heart of soho palermo.  It’s a cute place to stay.  Everything is within walk distance and there’s quite a nightlife there.  I will definitely be staying at Sol’s apartment whenever I’m in Buenos Aires again. :)
Nice Apartment in a Perfect Location
Nice and cozy apartment with a beautiful rooftop terrace, great location within Palermo

Perfect location in Palermo, close to tons of great restaurants and bars.  Easy access to the subte that will take you to all other areas within the city. Terrace was beautiful, especially when enjoying the wine Soledad had waiting for me upon arrival. Would definitely stay again.

Definitely check out sunset from the balcony or terrace. This rental has a great location for exploring the Palermo area. Super walkable and public transport nearby. Don't miss the Rosedal and dinner at Don Julio.

We stayed in Sol’s apartment for 4 nights & thought it was great. Sol always responded very quickly to emails. She kindly allowed us early check in & there was a bottle of wine on our arrival & pods for the coffee machine. Sol also arranged a taxi for us when we left. The apartment was clean & comfortable with a spacious bathroom. The kitchen, although small, has all that you need to prepare breakfast & lunch. Cooking a large dinner may be more of a challenge- but a good excuse to eat out! The apartment has a great balcony & roof garden with a jacuzzi. There are lots of lovely plants & this makes the apartment special. It is located in a very good area of Palermo with great bars & restaurants minutes away. It felt very safe walking around during the evening. The Subte (underground station) was about 20 minutes walk away but it’s a pleasant walk through tree lined streets. Buses stop outside the apartment but we never got around to using them. We have no hesitation in recommending Sol’s apartment.

The Studio is in a beautiful location in the middle of Palermo. Very cozy and like the pictures on the website!

Soledad is a great host. We felt very welcome after a long flight!

Thank you Soledad for arranging the transfer to the airport on our departure day and for the delicious bottle of wine, which we enjoyed on the rooftop!

Soledad's apartment was a great place to stay in the Palermo district of BA. We were also running quite late due to a delayed flight and Soledad was so kind and welcoming once we arrived. We loved the roof area and would certainly stay here again!
Soledad ist sehr zuverlässig und unkompliziert .

Sol's place is amazing: great location, great flat, and, above all, great host. Check in was easy and we felt right at home - especially with a complementary bottle of wine that Sol kindly left for us. The rooftop is beautiful and a great place to watch the sun go down, and the flat has everything you need. Thanks again!!

Soledad and her husband were amazing hosts.
The apartment was cleaned and smelling so good.
The decor is delicate and perfect matches with the view (inside the apartment or in the terrace in that amazing jacuzzi.
We stayed for our honeymoon and enjoyed a lot.
The location in Palermo is very good. Many restaurants, bus stops, subway (10 minutes walking).
Talking about this, enjoy Palermo walking around: beautiful views, great food and places to go shopping. District Arcos must be visited.
We highly recommend you to stay in soledad apartment.
Thank you so much, Soledad. You and your family are so kind and gentle.
Hugs!

Espetacular o apartamento de Soledad!
Limpo, cheiroso, com ótima roupa de cama e banho.
Um visual sensacional tanto da sala e quarto quanto do terraço.
Muito bem localizado em Palermo Soho, próximo aos melhores restaurantes de Buenos (URL HIDDEN) certeza vamos retornar!
Recomendo com nota 10!
Fabulous location, place exactly as pictured but patio even better. Soledad was fantastic and even helped when we locked ourselves out!!
Sol was very communicative, let us check in early, and her place was beautiful and in a wonderful neighborhood.
Very good location, Soledad is very kind, I highly recommend the flat !!

This apartment was perfect for our visit! It's located in a great neighborhood close to shops and restaurants and has a lovely roof deck with a jacuzzi. Soledad was a great host and very responsive! Thanks!

Só tenho que elogiar esse lugar e toda a recepção que tivermos pelos proprietários.  Um lugar maravilhoso lindo, magico. Melhor que qualquer hotel 5 estrelas. 
Pretendo voltar em breve!

This is one of the best Airbnb's we have stayed in! And Sol is the most amazing host. The apartment is very clean and well equipped with everything you could need. There is an amazing balcony and roof terrace! It is in a fantastic neighbourhood full of awesome restaurants and shops all within easy walking distance. Would recommend this to anyone visiting Buenos Aires. Thank you Sol!

Soledad's place was lovely and is in a beautiful part of Palermo Soho. The view from the rooftop deck was amazing and allowed us to enjoy some lovely sunrises and sunsets. We also really appreciated the coffee pods and the bottle of wine Soledad left us. 

I do want to mention something about the jacuzzi. We primarily booked this apartment because of the rooftop jacuzzi, and maybe this is a lost in translation sort of thing, but the jacuzzi was not exactly what we were expecting. The jacuzzi itself does not have any sort of water heating functionality. You fill it with hot water from two additional hot water heaters, but the water quickly gets cold. The tub does have jets and such, so I guess it is technically a jacuzzi, but you can't stay in it for more than half an hour before the water is cold. It also takes probably half an hour of preparation (filling it up, adjusting the temperature) before you can actually use it.

This is an amazing super clean apartment in the best part of Palermo walking distance to amazing bars and restaurants. Everything was perfect and the roof with jacuzzi is incredible! You won't regret making this your home base while exploring BA!
Soledad was extremely responsive and checked in on us throughout our trip. She also allowed us to check in early and check later than the posted times. I would highly recommend staying at Sol's!

The location of this apartment cannot be beat. It is right in the middle of Palermo, walking distance to all the best restaurants and bars. You could walk to Villa Crespo, and it was a quick uber drive to Recoleta, San Telmo, and Puerto Madero. The apartment is exactly as it appears in pictures - modern and with lots of natural light. To put the cherry on top, Soledad was very helpful and responsive before and during our stay. While there, we had a small issue with the jacuzzi, it didn't look like it had been cleaned. Soleded responded immediately to resolve our issue and we were able to enjoy the jacuzzi the next day. I highly recommend staying here and would love to go back!
Ótimo apartamento! Localização excelente, limpo e aconchegante.

Sol provided us a great stay in a very lively neighborhood. She was very helpful with recommendations nearby and also being flexible with our departure. Would certainly stay again when back in Buenos Aires!

Excelente! A localização é perfeita, perto dos melhores bares e restaurantes de Palermo Soho. O apartamento é realmente muito confortável, e tem tudo o que um eventual viajante possa vir a precisar. Cozinha bem equipada, banheiro limpo, bonito, espaçoso, e com tudo o que você pode precisar (shampoo, sabonete em barra e liquido, secador de cabelo), chuveiro é uma delícia. O apartamento é muito acolhedor, tudo muito limpo. Roupa de cama limpa e de excelente qualidade. Vale destacar a vista que invade todo o apartamento. Considero um privilégio viajar e ficar hospedado em um local com uma vista ampla da cidade, e nesse caso possível de apreciar até deitado na cama ou no sofá do estúdio. 
Soledad foi a melhor host que poderíamos encontrar, foi bem flexível nos horários do check in e chek out, adaptando as nossas necessidades, e esteve sempre disponível para qualquer eventualidade que tivéssemos.
A cereja do bolo, uma garrafa de vinho nos aguardando na  mesinha do apartamento. :)
Recomendo, e em uma próxima viagem a buenos aires ficaria novamente nesse apartamento sem pensar duas vezes.

Soledad has a great place, centrally located with a lot of great restaurants and nightlife around the area.  The place is nice and cozy with a nice rooftop.  Definitely great value for the cost and location.  The check in process was nice and smooth with great communication.  You can't go wrong with Soledad.  Highly recommended.

A residência de Soledad é um achado em Buenoa Aires. Localização perfeita para todos os tipos de atividade, no coração de Palermo Soho e a poucos passos de muitos bares, restaurantes e lojas. Possui acesso rápido aos principais meios de transporte. Os anfitriões são extremamente educados e estão sempre à disposição para ajudar nos problemas que possam surgir. A residência está de acordo com as informações prestadas no site. RECOMENDAMOS!!!! Obrigado Soledad e Fernando pela hospitalidade.
Excellent flat with a lot surprises to welcome you ! Definitely we will come back.

Our stay at Sol's place was amazing.  The apartment is incredible, with a private terrace and jacuzzi that one could only hope for.  The location is perfect, near tons of shops, restaurants, bars, etc.  Sol was a great hostess, always available if we needed anything. We will definitely stay here again if it's available on our next trip!!
This is the best place to stay in Buenos Aires. We absolutely loved it. It is the perfect spot for couples. Book this place now!

Soledad was a great hostess, very accessible and answered our questions super fast. Besides, she left some good amenities.
The apartment is amazing, very clean and organized just as we have seen in the pictures.
Next to the apartment there are several places to eat and have fun, as well as supermarkets and bakeries.
I would highly recommend staying in her apartment.

If you are planning to go to BA and you are trying to find an Airbnb to stay and you happen to see this listing, book this one NOW! I promise you that you won't regret your decision. Soledad's place is worth every penny and honestly I think it's more than worthwhile. The neighborhood Palermo is super safe, hip with tons of good restaurants and bars nearby. The access to the rooftop and the jacuzzi were the highlight of our stay. Soledad was also very sweet and thoughtful allowing us extra time to check in and check out. 
I cannot recommend enough this place to everyone.

Apartamento como descrito nas fotos, localização perfeita pra quem quer agito, bairro vibrante, muitas opções de bares e restaurantes, dos mais badalados aos clássicos !! Apartamento ótimo com todos os utensílios domésticos e a anfitriã sempre pronta para atender !! Recomendo e assim que puder voltarei!!

I had an amazing time in BA thanks to Soledad. She was super responsive and always made sure that everything was going fine. The flat is tidy, comfortable and quiet. It is super well located in the middle of Palermo. Would not consider going anywhere else if you are visiting BA, this is the perfect spot!

Delicious cocktail bar right next to it. Palermo Soho is a great neighborhood for walking around. It was easy to get on a bus and super easy to hail a cab right outside of the door to see sights in other neighborhoods.

Fantastic host, great apartment in the perfect location of Buenos Aires.
The apartment is very clean and cosy, the jacuzzi on the terrasse is a must try after a long day visiting.
There are many good restaurants and nice shops around the apartment.
We had a perfect stay.
100% recommended.

I really enjoyed my stay in this lovely apartment. The neighborhood had plenty of restaurants, but also a good variety of places to buy supplies to cook. I most appreciated the rooftop garden. What an oasis! Sol was able to flexible with my check-out time which made my last day of vacation fun and relaxing. I'd definitely stay here again!

Soledad's place was absolutely perfect for my friend's and my trip to BA! First thing'a first.... location, location, location! The apartment is near tons of great restaurants and bars in every direction, plus it felt like a very safe area as well. Everything was very clean and as expected. Sol provided many nice amenities such as shampoo and conditioner, a hair dryer, coffee k-cups, and a bottle of wine, which made our stay extra enjoyable and easy. We loved our time in Palermo Soho and would highly recommend this apartment to others!!

Sol was a wonderful host! She was very helpful and had great communication. We absolutely loved staying at her place, it was well equipped, very comfortable, and secure. The location is perfect to walk around Palermo ...We would definitely stay again!!

The rooftop space is really nice. The greenery and flowers make it feel very homey and it's a great place to sit and enjoy an evening. The whole area was remarkably quiet — we stayed several days and nights and never heard neighbors. The street noise was very minimal and never kept us awake. 

The kitchen is well-equipped with dishes and basic supplies. We were especially thankful for the coffeemaker and the fridge. 

We wished the air conditioning unit worked a little bit better — it got very warm in the apartment every night — but this wasn't a huge issue since we were gone during the days. 

The location is great and it feels very safe. It's within walking distance to tons of great restaurants and bars.

This apartment was in a great part of Palermo. It was really well equipped for our stay. The roof terrace is a particularly lovely space. An ideal rental for a couple. Soledad and her husband were very helpful hosts.

Our stay at Sol's place was great from beginning to end. She met us there to show us around (even though our flight was delayed repeatedly), and made some nice recommendations. The bottle of wine waiting for us was appreciated! The rooftop deck is great for relaxing after walking the city all day. We highly recommend staying here!
Palermo is a great neighbourhood to be based in - and the flat was just perfect - we hope to come back!

Soledad was a great host. She gave us good tips of what is good in the neighbourhood. She was very friendly and always available.
The apartment is located very well - right in the middle of Palermo Soho - most of the neighbourhood is accessible on foot. Everything was clean and tidy. We thoroughly enjoyed our stay! Plus, the rooftop jacuzzi was a great way to ring in the new year.
A lovely, charming apartment with a fabulous roof terrace in the heart of the funky, teeming Palermo neighbourhood. A perfect camp base when discovering BA.

Soledad was the perfect host and the apartment in the middle of it all in Palermo Soho is a perfect base for exploring the city. The room is cozy and full of light, and the roof is an oasis to escape to on a warm evening before hitting the nearby bars and restaurants. Thanks Sol!
W

Soledad and her husband were amazing hosts. They allowed us to check in early as our flight landed in BA in the morning. The apartment is amazing - perfect location, wonderful facilities and a perfect size for a couple. We loved the hot tub and the coffee and wine!!

We loved our stay at this apartment, everything was as described and shown in the pictures. The place was spacious and the jacuzzi was great surrounded by beautiful plants. Sol was waiting at the apartment to meet us and showed us around the place including how to operate the jacuzzi. There was a complimentary bottle of Malbec wine on the table as well to kick start the Argentinian holiday. The place is very near many great restaurants, supermarkets, and to the plaza Italia metro. We loved our stay!

I had a really good time in BA, in part thanks to this great place to stay. The apartment is in a cool spot of town with lots of great bars and restaurants. The rooftop is really pretty.
Sol was very responsive and helpful in setting everything up. She also was very flexible with the times of check-in and check-out which was very beneficial.
I'd definitely stay here again if travel takes me back to BA.

We've spent a month at Soledad's place in Palermo, and enjoyed the studio, the neighbourhood, and seeing Spring evolve in BsAs from the rooftop. The sunlight and the view of trees is a major bonus. Since much of what we were planning to do was within walking distance or a short collectivo or cab drive, we spent little time in traffic. Would we stay here again? Definitively!
We stayed for about a week for our honeymoon. We picked the place due to its location and the romantic view and were happy to see both we as advertised.

Soledad was very welcoming and got us settled in with no fuss.
The studio was perfect for our needs with a comfortable bed and block out blinds (essential for me!). The roof top oasis was fantastic with a jacuzzi for late night relaxation, flowering plants and mint for mojitos. 
The studio is located in a safe area with lots of people around enjoying the cafes, shops and late night bars. You will be spoilt for choice for all of these in this location. 
I recommend staying here and enjoying a great experience (not many places greet you with a bottle of wine!).
We will be back. :)

We stayed here twice during this trip to Argentina... and both times were a dream.  The location is unbeatable... so close to everything in Palermo.  We walked everywhere.  Soledad was an absolute angel!  She ALWAYS answered our emails in record time, she was so incredibly accommodating and sweet and helpful.  The space is so cozy and perfect in size for 2 people with a cute little kitchen and a very nice bathroom with a bidet!  We loved it so much that we're planning on putting a bidet in our home.  The upstairs terrace is SO beautiful.  We didn't get a chance to see it our first part of our stay because of the rain, but when we came back, it was the first thing we did - go upstairs to look.  The winter weather didn't allow for us to really spend time up there, but we are looking forward to coming back next year for a stay again and hopefully we'll have more opportunity to enjoy the terrace.  We have found our go to spot in Palermo!

We absolutely loved this place. Perfect location, beautifully kept... Soledad was so very accommodating and helpful. It's extremely comfortable to stay here and it's close to a lot of great restaurants and shops. 
Lots of nice touches in this place including a couple of great guides to Buenos Aires for reference. We also loved the blackout curtains that could be lowered at night to keep the sunlight out in the mornings we wanted to sleep in. 
We will definitely be staying here again in the future.
We had a fantastic stay at Soledad's apartment.  Great location, very helpful hostess with advice and helpful hints-- and that hot tub on the roof, perfect

We had a wonderful stay at Soledad's apartment! She was communicative before our trip and was there waiting for us when we arrived. Everything in the apartment is just as it says in the listing. The roof is a perfect place to relax after a full day of sightseeing! Palermo Soho is a great neighborhood to stay in that is not full of tourists. I highly recommend staying here!

Soledad é uma anfitriã maravilhosa que nos deixou muito bem acomodados em seu apartamento, de longe o melhor que já me hospedei com o AirBnB. A vista do terraço é espetacular e os finais de tarde na Jacuzzi, fazendo comida no grill que ela disponibiliza, mirando Palermo Soho, estão entre os melhores momentos da viagem. Conforto mais do que garantido! Recomendo muito!

Palermo is a friendly place for anyone who like to feel the city as local. Apartment was great. Soledad was waiting for us and she was all the time concerned if everything was fine. Details that make diferences such as external jacuzzi, a bottle of Argentinian wine and coffee machine available. I highly recommend stay there, for everything: excellent  apartment, good spot location (restaurants, sightseeing, nightclubs).  I would say it was one of best experiences that I've ever had with AirBnb units.

A estádia na casa da Soledad foi fantástica. 
A localização é excelente, perto de tudo e com várias opções de bares, restaurantes, praças e tudo mais. Na minha opinião, o melhor bairro da cidade. 
A casa é maravilhosa, com espaço, arrumada, confortável e (URL HIDDEN) muita segurança também).
Em todo o momento a Soledad estava disposta a ajudar e se dispor a tirar dúvidas que tínhamos em relação ao turimos e passeios que gostaríamos de fazer. 
Não penso em ficar em outro lugar quando voltar a Buenos Aires. 
A viagem foi perfeita e a locação desse apartamento fez toda a diferença. 
Espero voltar mais! 
Obrigada pela recepção.
:)

The apartment is very charming with a roof terrace which makes it even more charming. Walking around in BA for a couple of days, I must say the area this apartment is located is the best area of the city. With Lots of small restaurants and shops, the area gives one a village feeling. Soledad is the best host. The perfect word to describe her for me would be "PROFESSIONAL". Fast in her reply, getting things done without too much of back and forth. She understood our needs and helped us through out our stay. Thanks Soledad.
reviews.response: Thanks Allen for your review! We hope you on your next trip to BA!

reviews.comments: Unfortunately we did not meet Soledad, but we did meet her husband who was lovely. The apartment is also lovely and in a perfect location for Palermo's fab restaurants and bars. The rooftop jacuzzi is a great addition!
I had a great time staying in soledad's place. Clean, comfortable and in a great neighborhood. Exactly as advertised!

Sol's apartment was chic, eclectic and everything you would want from a local spot in Buenos Aires. The private rooftop is a rare commodity and an amazing feature to enjoy a glass a wine at home. Sol and her husband were so responsive and gracious to accommodate our schedule. The best feature was the location. My husband and I were walking distance to several shops, bars and restaurants and centrally located to transport around the city. Definitely would stay here again if we come back to visit. :)

My wife and I just finished a three week vacation in South America, including nine days in Buenos Aires, all of which was spent at Soledad's wonderful apartment. The apartment itself, and the help and support we received from Soledad was in a word 'perfect'. 
The apartment had all the amenities needed, and was spacious and immaculate. We made great use of the balcony and of course the roof top terrace with the jacuzzi (which we used on three occasions!!).
The apartment is in a great location, near plenty of great restaurants, etc. 
Soledad was the perfect host - she (and her husband and two wonderful children) met us on our arrival and provided a great overview and all the necessary details. She was always very prompt in replying to any of our e mail questions, and arranged return transportation for us to the airport. 
If we are ever back in Buenos Aires (which we hope to be) we will certainly want to stay here again, and we would highly recommend this apartment for anyone spending any time in Buenos Aires. It was truly great!

Soledad and Fernando provided a beautiful retreat in a lively neighborhood with plentiful restaurants, cafes, and boutiques. If I ever find myself in Buenos Aires again I will definitely stay here. Also, Soledad was extremely responsive and communicative throughout the whole process, even checking in to see if everything was going well after my first day. Muchas gracias!

The apartment was amazing. Exactly as per the photos and the hosts were beyond helpful with tips. Their communication was flawless. There was a small matter that was out of the hosts control. They were very responsive. I would highly recommend this apartment to friends

Soledad and her partner were very nice hosts, and the apartment is excellently located  and as smartly constructed as it looks. I can highly recommend staying here for anyone wanting the ease of Palermo Soho at your fingertips.
The perfect apartment in the best part of Buenos Aires. Just like the photos. The private rooftop is really beautiful. Sol was a great host. Thank you!

The apartment was beautiful and perfectly located. Exactly as described in the photos and description. It was a pleasure to stay here and Soledad was extremely helpful. Would definitely stay here again on a return trip to Buenos Aires!

We loved Soledad 's place. She was a super accommodating host. We were running late getting in and she was very flexiable about our arrival. The apartment was amazing and had everything you could want. Would love to stay again

Soledad was a great host. Amazing location in an amazing city. Very responsive. Seamless check in and check out. Bottle of wine was a great touch. Felt very safe and secure and was also very homey. Would definitely stay again!

Soledad was extremely accomodating! She was very friendly, lives a few blocks down the street should you have any issues (which you likely won't) and is very quick to respond to airbnb messages and texts.

When we arrived, the studio was clean and bright. Soledad provided coffee and nearly any amenity you can think of for the kitchen and bathroom, she even had a spare iphone charger! The view from the balcony is is lovely and the private rooftop jacuzzi was so relaxing and tranquil. 

If all that wasn't enough, the number one perk about this studio is the location. You are mere blocks away from awesome restaurants, cafes, markets, stores, etc. This neighborhood is young and lively and safe and charming.

Soledad's apartment was perfect. In the heart of Palermo with tons of great restaurants, shops, and sites. The rooftop jacuzzi and bottle of Malbec was a nice treat. Sol left very clear instructions for everything, was very responsive to questions, and helped us call a taxi to our early morning flight out of BA. I would definitely recommend to anyone, great stay!

Soledad's place is excellent. The location is perfect and is in walking distance to lots of restaurants and bars. Palermo Soho is a great area to explore and the apartment is modern with lots of light and very clean.

Soledad's place is an absolute gem.  We spent our honeymoon week here, and it was a fantastic visit.  The apartment is lovely, and the rooftop deck is a true refuge.  We met in Palermo SoHo 5 years ago, and this apartment was the perfect way to return to the neighborhood.  Soledad has thought of everything, right down to artisanal soap, toothbrushes, luxuriously large towels, and a capsule coffee machine to get the day rolling before you venture out for a stronger coffee and medialunas -- or empanadas -- in the neighborhood.  We walked and walked and walked, and then walked some more to explore not only Palermo, but many other parts of town, as well.  Returning each afternoon for a nap behind the very effective blackout shades and a jacuzzi before dinner was really a luxury.  The key turnover was super easy and convenient both at the beginning and end of our stay.  Soledad was an easy text message away on the couple occasions when we needed a bit of extra help.  She very kindly arranged our transportation back to the airport when my sub-par Spanish failed me.  Soledad and her family were very friendly, the place is gorgeous, and the value can't be beat.  Stay here if you're able to - you'll be glad you did!

This is a great apartment in a great city!
We stayed 5 nights, Sol was very helpful and communicative both before and after our arrival. The studio is exactly as listed, it is in a fantastic neighbourhood – lots of restaurants within a 10 minute walk – we went to several that Sol recommended and were never disappointed.
Everything you need is in the apartment, including a corkscrew for the (much appreciated) complimentary bottle of Malbec! The Wi-Fi is good, the bed is comfortable then we come to the rooftop terrace and the Jacuzzi! We were blessed with brilliant weather and chilling on the roof with a nice bottle of wine after a long day walking and exploring was just great.

We have stayed in quite a few Airbnb apartments and this is right up there with the very best – highly recommended.

Soledad's home was wonderful - clean, bright, and cozy. She welcomed us with maps of the city, tourist books, fresh towels, shampoo, conditioner, a bottle of wine --- all in addition to a beautiful home and amazing two-level deck : )

The apartment and private rooftop were exactly as described. The place was spotless when we arrived and the surrounding neighborhood is amazing with a variety of great shopping and outdoor eating. Also, Soledad was as helpful and accommodating as anyone could imagine. Truly the best AIRBNB experience I've ever had. Hopefully, I'll have the opportunity to one day return.

Excellent location, right next to restaurant and bars, feels very safe in this area.  beautiful apartment.  The jacuzzi is perfect after a long day walking around Buenos Aires to relax in.  I would definitely recommend to others. Soledad was very good with communication, we arrived later than expected but they still waited in the apartment with no problems. Very easy going.
Soledad was a great host and very welcoming.

What can I say about this perfect place?  The setup was incredible, your own private rooftop with jacuzzi and sitting area was spectacular.  The apartment was so well taken care of, it looks brand new even today.  But the thing I liked most was Soledad's attention to detail... From the soaps, shampoos and towels for each of the sinks, shower and jacuzzi to the cups, coffee, and even some wine =).  This place could not be more perfectly located in the heart of palermo..  Truly a wonderful place to stay and I will be back to stay at this apartment as soon as possible.  Gracias Soledad!

Soledad's studio was absolutely wonderful!  My wife & I have been to Buenos Aires 2x in the last year and this place is the best!  It's in a perfect location in Palermo, the inside is perfect (just like the photos) and the rooftop terrace is perfect for those BA summer nights!  Although I didn't meet Soledad personally, we communicated often and she was very attentive to our needs and travel plans.  Would definitely recommend this place!

Best way to live like a local in BA!
Sol's apartment is in the perfect spot between Palermo Soho & Hollywood, with countless great bars, cafes and restaurants right on your doorstep. The flat was a great size, and the rooftop was an amazing extra touch! We really enjoyed our time there, and found Sol really helpful - answering our questions right away & coming to help us whenever we needed. Would definitely recommend!

What an amazing apartment! Perfectly situated in Palermo for wandering the beautiful neighbourhood and shops of the area. It's cozy, clean, and the roof tub is something else. There's no better way to unwind after treading the pavement all day than nipping upstairs to relax in the jacuzzi with a drink as you watch the evening turn to night. Sol & Fer were perfect hosts. Definitely stay here if you're looking to spend time in BsAs.

The appartment is wonderful- brandnew, high quality and stylish furnishing with a very comfortable bed. It also has an amazing rooftop terrace with a jacuzzi. Location is in the heart of Palermo, all cafés and restaurants at your doorstep. Soledad is the best host, when I needed help with the safe she came by herself and helped me out. 
Absolutely recommendable!

Fantastic flat which I'd highly recommend to anyone. Exactly as described in the listing. The roof terrace with jacuzzi is excellent and the location fantastic. Sol was extremely helpful and easy to contact. We'll be back!
Perfect place to visit buenos aires. Thanks Soledad!

Die Beschreibung der Unterkunft war genau und die Bilder entsprachen auch genau der Wohnung. Die Wohnung ist sehr gut gepflegt und man kann sogar in der Küche vorhandene Verbrauchsmaterialien wie Kaffee, etc. nutzen. Das Handbuch war auch sehr hilfreich, vor allem bei der Nutzung des Whirlpools auf dem Dach. Insgesamt ist die Location der Wohnung der Hit, direkt in Palermo Soho und die Dachterasse einfach der Hammer! Insgesamt super und sehr weiter zu empfehlen!
